tone_notes: Hopeful but realistic. Institutional progress shown through bureaucratic detail - budget meetings, analyst interviews, office renovation. Media coverage handled with professional restraint. Emotional closure at grave is understated, no melodrama. Teaching scenes show practical collaboration. Video call with Chen is brief but meaningful. Ending reinforces Sisyphean nature but with acceptance and commitment. Spring weather metaphor for gradual improvement. Dry humor continues (Sara and Emil's text exchange).
bridge_to_resolution: Sets up all elements for 6-month time jump: task force approved and assembling, Yusuf teaching regularly, Chen safe in protection, public awareness established, institutional support secured. Final note about new crimes emerging foreshadows the new case in Ch20. Sara's emotional closure and acceptance of her role prepares for her confident leadership in resolution.
